description: Non-REM RDI at 3% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-REM sleep associated with >= 3% desat) / (hours of NREM sleep)]
calculation: rdinr3p  = 60*(hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3) / (slpprdp - minremp)

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-rem RDI at 3% desat
